effect.shortEffect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail. Protects against hail damage.
effect.full: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
description.platinum: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
